Game.Name: Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time & Lara Croft Tomb Raider - The Prophecy (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl+En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time & Lara Croft - Tomb Raider: The Prophecy is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by Ubisoft,which was released in Europe in 2006.Cheat: Enter the following at the password screen:Cheat: First, hang on to a ledge and fall off, but don't move after you fall. If there is a wall next to you, you will slide through it if you press and hold DOWN.Cheat: If you've got this game for the Gamecube, you will find white boxes spilling light on the GCube version. Connect to the GCube using a GCN-GBA Adaptor plug. When you break the boxes, you will unlock a level each time.
